${ModID}:PokeballBelt.NAME: Pokeball Belt
${ModID}:PokeballBelt.FLAVOR: Watch out for the tall grass.
DESCRIPTIONS: #yPokeballs. NL You can attempt to catch #yPokemon during combat by #yclicking the #yThrow #yPokeball button next to a #yPokemon's intent. NL Captured #yPokemon are obtained at the end of combat.
